relations.target: ass: the fleshy part of the human body that you sit on; 'he deserves a good kick in the butt'; 'are you going to sit on your fanny and do nothing?' <i66132>
bad: characterized by wickedness or immorality; 'led a very bad life' <i6202>
person: a human being; 'there was too much for one person to do' <i35562>

senses.definition: A person considered impressive due to extreme attitudes, behavior or appearance [Wiktionary]
